## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                | Description                   | Default value |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| GO_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| GO_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
